mapper.select: SELECT asd.str_dt_name , st.str_idx , asd.str_dt_address FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON asd.str_idx = st.str_idx LEFT JOIN ad_category ct ON st.str_category = ct.ct_idx WHERE asd.str_dt_type = 'ko' AND ct.ct_parent = #{type} GROUP BY st.str_idx , asd.str_dt_type

SELECT st.str_idx , st.str_lng , st.str_lat , st.str_image AS str_image , st.str_phone , st.str_website , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ad_like li WHERE li.str_idx = st.str_idx) AS str_like_cnt , st.operating_hour , asd.str_dt_name , asd.str_dt_type , IFNULL(asd.str_dt_desc, '내용 없음') AS str_dt_desc , asd.str_dt_address FROM ad_store st LEFT JOIN ad_store_detail asd ON asd.str_idx = st.str_idx WHERE str_use = 'Y' AND st.str_idx = #{str_idx} GROUP BY asd.str_dt_type, st.str_idx

SELECT rw.ct_idx , (SELECT ct_ko_nm FROM ad_category high WHERE high.ct_idx = rw.ct_parent) AS ct_parent_nm , rw.ct_use , rw.ct_ko_nm , rw.ct_es_nm , rw.ct_eu_nm , rw.ct_zh_nm , rw.ct_de_nm , rw.ct_ja_nm , rw.ct_reg_dt , rw.ct_update_dt FROM ad_category rw WHERE rw.ct_idx > 1
AND rw.ct_parent > 1
AND rw.ct_parent = 1

SELECT ac.ct_idx , ac.ct_ko_nm , ac.ct_ja_nm , ac.ct_es_nm , ac.ct_eu_nm , ac.ct_zh_nm , ac.ct_de_nm , DATE_FORMAT(ac.ct_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ct_reg_dt FROM ad_category ac WHERE ac.ct_idx = #{ct_idx}
